text.section: In this section, "affiliate" means any company that controls, is controlled by, or is under common control with an institution described in subsection (c) of this section.

The exemption in subsection (b)(10) of this section applies to subsidiaries and affiliates of:
Any bank, trust company, savings bank, savings and loan association, or credit union incorporated or chartered under the laws of this State; or
Any other-state bank, as that term is defined in § 5-1001 of this article, having a branch that accepts deposits in this State.

The exemptions provided in subsection (b) of this section do not apply to any person who has been denied a license to engage in business as a mortgage lender or real estate broker or whose license to engage in such activities has been suspended or revoked within the 3 immediately preceding calendar years.
